text.ascii: duryodhana uvAca
text.ur: duryodhana uvāca

text.ascii: ajAnatas te rAdheya nAbhyasUyAmy ahaM vacaH
text.ur: ajānatas te rādheya nābhyasūyāmy ahaṁ vacaḥ

text.ascii: jAnAsi tvaM jitAJ zatrUn gandharvAMs tejasA mayA
text.ur: jānāsi tvaṁ jitāñ śatrūn gandharvāṁs tejasā mayā

text.ascii: AyodhitAs tu gandharvAH suciraM sodarair mama
text.ur: āyodhitās tu gandharvāḥ suciraṁ sodarair mama

text.ascii: mayA saha mahAbAho kRtaz cobhayataH kSayaH
text.ur: mayā saha mahābāho kr̥taś cobhayataḥ kṣayaḥ

text.ascii: mAyAdhikAs tv ayudhyanta yadA zUrA viyadgatAH
text.ur: māyādhikās tv ayudhyanta yadā śūrā viyadgatāḥ

text.ascii: tadA no nasamaM yuddham abhavat saha khecaraiH
text.ur: tadā no nasamaṁ yuddham abhavat saha khecaraiḥ

text.ascii: parAjayaM ca prAptAH sma raNe bandhanam eva ca
text.ud: पराजयं च प्राप्ताः स्म रणे बन्धनमेव च
text.ur: parājayaṁ ca prāptāḥ sma raṇe bandhanam eva ca

text.ascii: sabhRtyAmAtyaputrAz ca sadAradhanavAhanAH
text.ur: sabhr̥tyāmātyaputrāś ca sadāradhanavāhanāḥ

text.ascii: uccair AkAzamArgeNa hriyAmas taiH suduHkhitAH
text.ur: uccair ākāśamārgeṇa hriyāmas taiḥ suduḥkhitāḥ

text.ascii: atha naH sainikAH ke cid amAtyAz ca mahArathAn
text.ur: atha naḥ sainikāḥ ke cid amātyāś ca mahārathān

text.ascii: upagamyAbruvan dInAH pANDavAJ zaraNapradAn
text.ur: upagamyābruvan dīnāḥ pāṇḍavāñ śaraṇapradān

text.ascii: eSa duryodhano rAjA dhArtarASTraH sahAnujaH
text.ur: eṣa duryodhano rājā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sahānujaḥ

text.ascii: sAmAtyadAro hriyate gandharvair divam AsthitaiH
text.ur: sāmātyadāro hriyate gandharvair divam āsthitaiḥ

text.ascii: taM mokSayata bhadraM vaH sahadAraM narAdhipam
text.ud: तं मोक्षयत भद्रं वः सहदारं नराधिपम्
text.ur: taṁ mokṣayata bhadraṁ vaḥ sahadāraṁ narādhipam

text.ascii: parAmarzo mA bhaviSyat kurudAreSu sarvazaH
text.ur: parāmarśo mā bhaviṣyat kurudāreṣu sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: evam ukte tu dharmAtmA jyeSThaH pANDusutas tadA
text.ur: evam ukte tu dharmātmā jyeṣṭhaḥ pāṇḍusutas tadā

text.ascii: prasAdya sodarAn sarvAn AjJApayata mokSaNe
text.ur: prasādya sodarān sarvān ājñāpayata mokṣaṇe

text.ascii: athAgamya tam uddezaM pANDavAH puruSarSabhAH
text.ur: athāgamya tam uddeśaṁ pāṇḍavāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ

text.ascii: sAntvapUrvam ayAcanta zaktAH santo mahArathAH
text.ur: sāntvapūrvam ayācanta śaktāḥ santo mahārathāḥ

text.ascii: yadA cAsmAn na mumucur gandharvAH sAntvitA api
text.ur: yadā cāsmān na mumucur gandharvāḥ sāntvitā api

text.ascii: tato 'rjunaz ca bhImaz ca yamajau ca balotkaTau
text.ur: tato ’rjunaś ca bhīmaś ca yamajau ca balotkaṭau

text.ascii: mumucuH zaravarSANi gandharvAn pratyanekazaH
text.ur: mumucuḥ śaravarṣāṇi gandharvān pratyanekaśaḥ

text.ascii: atha sarve raNaM muktvA prayAtAH khacarA divam
text.ud: अथ सर्वे रणं मुक्त्वा प्रयाताः खचरा दिवम्
text.ur: atha sarve raṇaṁ muktvā prayātāḥ khacarā divam

text.ascii: asmAn evAbhikarSanto dInAn muditamAnasAH
text.ur: asmān evābhikarṣanto dīnān muditamānasāḥ

text.ascii: tataH samantAt pazyAmi zarajAlena veSTitam
text.ur: tataḥ samantāt paśyāmi śarajālena veṣṭitam

text.ascii: amAnuSANi cAstrANi prayuJjAnaM dhanaMjayam
text.ur: amānuṣāṇi cāstrāṇi prayuñjānaṁ dhanaṁjayam

text.ascii: samAvRtA dizo dRSTvA pANDavena zitaiH zaraiH
text.ud: समावृता दिशो दृष्ट्वा पाण्डवेन शितैः शरैः
text.ur: samāvr̥tā diśo dr̥ṣṭvā pāṇḍavena śitaiḥ śaraiḥ

text.ascii: dhanaMjayasakhAtmAnaM darzayAm Asa vai tadA
text.ur: dhanaṁjayasakhātmānaṁ darśayām āsa vai tadā

text.ascii: citrasenaH pANDavena samAzliSya paraMtapaH
text.ur: citrasenaḥ pāṇḍavena samāśliṣya paraṁtapaḥ

text.ascii: kuzalaM paripapraccha taiH pRSTaz cApy anAmayam
text.ur: kuśalaṁ paripapraccha taiḥ pr̥ṣṭaś cāpy anāmayam

text.ascii: te sametya tathAnyonyaM saMnAhAn vipramucya ca
text.ur: te sametya tathānyonyaṁ saṁnāhān vipramucya ca

text.ascii: ekIbhUtAs tato vIrA gandharvAH saha pANDavaiH
text.ur: ekībhūtās tato vīrā gandharvāḥ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ

text.ascii: apUjayetAm anyonyaM citrasenadhanaMjayau
text.ur: apūjayetām anyonyaṁ citrasenadhanaṁjayau
